question: Will Erling Haaland break the Premier League goals record in the 22/23 season? (34 goals)
description:
The Premier League's 2022/23 season started on August 6, 2022, and the final match round is scheduled for May 28, 2023. Erling Haaland has already scored 15 goals, and there is significant buzz that he may break the Premier League's record of 34 goals scored in a season, currently shared by Andy Cole (Newcastle 1993-94) and Alan Shearer (Blackburn 1994-95).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Erling Haaland scores 35 or more goals in the Premier League's 2022/23 season. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve as soon as Erling Haaland scores his 35th goal in the Premier League 2022/23 season, or otherwise plays his last scheduled match in the Premier League 2022/23 season.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the premier league (e.g. https://www.premierleague.com/players/65970/Erling-Haaland/stats?co=1&se=489).
